item.title: NFPA 72 2022 Edition - New Fire Alarm Requirements
item.description: The State Fire Marshal announces new requirements for fire alarm systems based on NFPA 72 2022 edition. All commercial buildings must comply by January 1, 2027. This affects hospitals, data centers, and high-rise buildings.

item.title: Fire Sprinkler System Inspection Requirements Updated
item.description: Updated inspection requirements for fire sprinkler systems in commercial buildings. Quarterly inspections are now mandatory for all systems.

item.title: Emergency Evacuation Plan Compliance Deadline
item.description: All commercial buildings must submit updated emergency evacuation plans by March 1, 2026. This applies to buildings over 50,000 square feet.
